Sheet.name: R1-CHEM
Sheet.sql: select catno,catname,machineno,machinename, NULLIF(opening,0) opening,NULLIF(closing,0) closing, NULLIF(invendor,0) invendor,NULLIF(inInterlab,0) inInterlab,NULLIF(inSponsor,0) inSponsor, NULLIF(incharges,0) incharges, intotal, NULLIF(outtrialtest,0) outtrialtest,NULLIF(outValidation,0) outValidation, NULLIF(outdiscard,0) outdiscard,NULLIF(outIntelLab,0) outIntelLab,NULLIF(outSponsor,0) outSponsor, NULLIF(outother,0) outother, outtotal, CNY,USD,SGD,EUR,GBP,localprice,totalAmount,remark from( SELECT a.catno,a.catname,a.batchno,a.machineno,a.machineName,a.price, closing+outtotal-intotal opening, sum(a.inVendor) invendor, sum(a.inInterlab) ininterlab, sum(a.inSponsor) insponsor, sum(a.inCharges) incharges,sum(a.intotal) intotal,sum(outTrialTest) outtrialtest, sum(outValidation) outvalidation, sum(outDiscard) outdiscard,sum(outIntelLab) outintellab,sum(outSponsor) outsponsor, sum(outOthre) outother,sum(outTotal) outtotal,a.closing closing, a.CNY,a.USD,a.SGD,a.EUR,a.GBP,a.localprice localprice,a.totalAmount,null as remark FROM r_view a WHERE ( a.indate IS NULL OR a.indate BETWEEN ? AND ?) AND ( a.outdate IS NULL OR a.outdate BETWEEN ? AND ?) GROUP BY a.catno,a.catname,a.batchno,a.price,a.machineno,a.machineName ) T ORDER BY catname

select catno,catname,machineno,machinename, NULLIF(opening,0) opening,NULLIF(closing,0) closing, NULLIF(invendor,0) invendor,NULLIF(inInterlab,0) inInterlab,NULLIF(inSponsor,0) inSponsor, NULLIF(incharges,0) incharges, intotal, NULLIF(outtrialtest,0) outtrialtest,NULLIF(outValidation,0) outValidation, NULLIF(outdiscard,0) outdiscard,NULLIF(outIntelLab,0) outIntelLab,NULLIF(outSponsor,0) outSponsor, NULLIF(outother,0) outother, outtotal, CNY,USD,SGD,EUR,GBP,localprice,totalAmount,remark from( SELECT a.catno,a.catname,a.batchno,a.machineno,a.machineName,a.price, closing+outtotal-intotal opening, sum(a.inVendor) invendor, sum(a.inInterlab) ininterlab, sum(a.inSponsor) insponsor, sum(a.inCharges) incharges,sum(a.intotal) intotal,sum(outTrialTest) outtrialtest, sum(outValidation) outvalidation, sum(outDiscard) outdiscard,sum(outIntelLab) outintellab,sum(outSponsor) outsponsor, sum(outOthre) outother,sum(outTotal) outtotal,a.closing closing, a.CNY,a.USD,a.SGD,a.EUR,a.GBP,a.localprice localprice,a.totalAmount,null as remark FROM r_view a WHERE ( a.indate IS NULL OR a.indate BETWEEN ? AND ?) AND ( a.outdate IS NULL OR a.outdate BETWEEN ? AND ?) GROUP BY a.catno,a.catname,a.batchno,a.price,a.machineno,a.machineName ) T ORDER BY catname

Sheet.name: Discard_CLab
Sheet.sql: select catno,catname,machineno,machinename, NULLIF(opening,0) opening,NULLIF(closing,0) closing, NULLIF(invendor,0) invendor,NULLIF(inInterlab,0) inInterlab,NULLIF(inSponsor,0) inSponsor, NULLIF(incharges,0) incharges, intotal, NULLIF(outtrialtest,0) outtrialtest,NULLIF(outValidation,0) outValidation, NULLIF(outdiscard,0) outdiscard,NULLIF(outIntelLab,0) outIntelLab,NULLIF(outSponsor,0) outSponsor, NULLIF(outother,0) outother, outtotal, CNY,USD,SGD,EUR,GBP,localprice,totalAmount,remark from( SELECT a.catno,a.catname,a.batchno,a.machineno,a.machineName,a.price, closing+outtotal-intotal opening, sum(a.inVendor) invendor, sum(a.inInterlab) ininterlab, sum(a.inSponsor) insponsor, sum(a.inCharges) incharges,sum(a.intotal) intotal,sum(outTrialTest) outtrialtest, sum(outValidation) outvalidation, sum(outDiscard) outdiscard,sum(outIntelLab) outintellab,sum(outSponsor) outsponsor, sum(outOthre) outother,sum(outTotal) outtotal,a.closing closing, a.CNY,a.USD,a.SGD,a.EUR,a.GBP,a.localprice localprice,a.totalAmount,null as remark FROM r_view a WHERE ( a.indate IS NULL OR a.indate BETWEEN ? AND ?) AND ( a.outdate IS NULL OR a.outdate BETWEEN ? AND ?) GROUP BY a.catno,a.catname,a.batchno,a.price,a.machineno,a.machineName ) T ORDER BY catname

Sheet.name: Validation_APLab
Sheet.sql: select catno,catname,machineno,machinename, NULLIF(opening,0) opening,NULLIF(closing,0) closing, NULLIF(invendor,0) invendor,NULLIF(inInterlab,0) inInterlab,NULLIF(inSponsor,0) inSponsor, NULLIF(incharges,0) incharges, intotal, NULLIF(outtrialtest,0) outtrialtest,NULLIF(outValidation,0) outValidation, NULLIF(outdiscard,0) outdiscard,NULLIF(outIntelLab,0) outIntelLab,NULLIF(outSponsor,0) outSponsor, NULLIF(outother,0) outother, outtotal, CNY,USD,SGD,EUR,GBP,localprice,totalAmount,remark from( SELECT a.catno,a.catname,a.batchno,a.machineno,a.machineName,a.price, closing+outtotal-intotal opening, sum(a.inVendor) invendor, sum(a.inInterlab) ininterlab, sum(a.inSponsor) insponsor, sum(a.inCharges) incharges,sum(a.intotal) intotal,sum(outTrialTest) outtrialtest, sum(outValidation) outvalidation, sum(outDiscard) outdiscard,sum(outIntelLab) outintellab,sum(outSponsor) outsponsor, sum(outOthre) outother,sum(outTotal) outtotal,a.closing closing, a.CNY,a.USD,a.SGD,a.EUR,a.GBP,a.localprice localprice,a.totalAmount,null as remark FROM r_view a WHERE ( a.indate IS NULL OR a.indate BETWEEN ? AND ?) AND ( a.outdate IS NULL OR a.outdate BETWEEN ? AND ?) GROUP BY a.catno,a.catname,a.batchno,a.price,a.machineno,a.machineName ) T ORDER BY catname
